      • loadTranslationTable

        public boolean loadTranslationTable(Taxa taxa,
                                    java.lang.String translationFile)
        Given a taxon name "name", this method returns the taxon number this name represents. This one is based upon the contents of the translation file only.

      • whichTaxonNumberFromTranslationTable

        public int whichTaxonNumberFromTranslationTable(Taxa taxa,
                                                java.lang.String name)
        Given a taxon name "name", this method returns the taxon number this name represents. This one is based upon the contents of the translation table created from the translation file only. The translation table is an array of the names, and the taxon number is then the index into that array for a particular name.

      • whichTaxonNumberFromNumberTranslationTable

        public int whichTaxonNumberFromNumberTranslationTable(Taxa taxa,
                                                      int otherNumber)
        Given a taxon number in another numbering system system, this method returns the taxon number in the main taxon numbering system. This one is based upon the contents of the number translation table. This is a reverse of the standard translation table; it is an array of taxon numbers, and the index into that array is the taxon number in the other system.

      • getTranslationTable

        public java.lang.String getTranslationTable(Taxa taxa)
